tool_description: A curated (120+) typeface combinations from Google Fonts, including details about tones, types, styles, and categories. The API also includes configurations for font sizes, letter spacing, and line heights, allowing developers and designers to create engaging and visually appealing content.
name: Typography
title: Typography

api_list.name: /type
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://typography.p.rapidapi.com/type"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "typography.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
